channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Russian forces weaker than they claim, say Chinese POWs
A Chinese man who said he fought for Russia said he couldn't even go to the bathroom without an armed escort
Honda to make 90% of US sales locally by relocating Mexico, Canada production, Nikkei reports
A tech investor says AI is already coming for jobs — and 2 professions should be very nervous
Extended heatwave in India, Pakistan to test survivability limits, with temperatures reaching Death Valley levels
2 hikers stranded in remote areas of Arizona desert rescued in separate incidents
item.description: Two people have been rescued in separate incidents after being stranded in remote areas of the desert in southern Arizona, authorities said.

item.title: Officials work to uncover the motive for fire set at Pennsylvania governor’s residence

item.title: Man detained in Caribbean for famed crime reporter's 2021 murder
item.description: Authorities detained a man "who played a leading role" in the high-profile murder of crime reporter Peter R. de Vries, prosecutors said.

item.title: Trump admin live updates: 3rd federal judge blocks some deportations under the AEA
item.description: A third federal judge has temporarily blocked some deportations under the Alien Enemies Act.

item.title: How to request a tax extension from the IRS
item.description: Filing a tax extension is easy. But it's important to know what you're getting into, including what to do if you owe money to the IRS.

item.title: Fewer people are traveling to other states for abortion as laws shift, a study finds
item.description: A new study has found that fewer people crossed state lines for abortions in 2024 than the previous year.
